meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for virtual table tx_imageautoresize

languageKey.label:
Comma-separated list of directories to be monitored. Example: fileadmin/
Wildcard is supported: fileadmin/*/images/ fileadmin/**/images/
Comma-separated list of file types to be handled. Example: jpg,jpeg,png,tif,tiff
Images larger than this value will be resized (allowed units: B|K|M).
Images will be resized up to this maximum width.
Images will be resized up to this maximum height.
Will try to auto-magically orient image (useful with photos).
If ticked, IM will not use $GLOBALS['TYPO3_CONF_VARS']['GFX']['im_stripProfileCommand'] and thus, color profile and metadata such as EXIF, IPTC and XMP will be kept.
If ticked, PNG files with an alpha channel will be resized even though the transparency will be lost
Line-separated list of conversion mapping instructions. This lets you automatically convert the type of the image while resizing it. Example: bmp => jpg tif => jpg

You may define as many rule sets as you wish. They will be evaluated one after the other in order to possibly override general settings. The evalutation stops as soon as a matching rule set has been found.
